sentences.sContent: ...the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights.
sentences.sCn: …公民权利和政治权利国际公约。

synos.tran: 契约，盟约；圣约；盖印合同

phrases.pCn: n. 约柜（藏于古犹太圣殿至圣所内、刻有十诫的两块石板）

remMethod.val: co + ven(来) + ant → 来到一起立约 → 契约

trans.tranOther: a legal agreement in which someone promises to pay a person or organization an amount of money regularly
